plot: How does one save the music of a promising young artist 'The Messenger' from inevitably going bad? By giving him a romantic death.
title: A Romantic Death
plot_es: How does one save the music of a promising young artist 'The Messenger' from inevitably going bad? By giving him a romantic death.
plot_en: How does one save the music of a promising young artist 'The Messenger' from inevitably going bad? By giving him a romantic death.
